title: Dr. V. Raj Kumar
text:
LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Github
  

  
  
Dr. V. Raj Kumar is an Assistant Professor in the area of Marketing Management at the Indian Institute of Management Jammu. Earlier he has worked with Vellore Institute of Technology and Anna University. He has done his Ph.D. and MBA from College of Engineering Guindy, Anna University, Chennai and B.Sc. (Visual Communication) from The New College, Chennai.
His research interest is in the area of Marketing and Data Sciences. In marketing, his topics of interest include Consumer-Brand Engagement (CBE) in Social Media, Anthropomorphism of brands, and Social media use for news and perception of social reality. Similarly, in Data Science, his topics of interest are Social Network Analysis, Text Mining, and Multi-Criteria Decision-Making.


Anna University, Chennai | Chennai, India PhD in Management Sciences | 2019
Anna University, Chennai | Chennai, India MBA Marketing & Systems | 2010
The New College, Chennai | Chennai, India B.Sc. in Visual Communication | 2008



Assistant Professor, Marketing | Indian Institute of Management Jammu | 2021 - present
Assistant Professor, Marketing, VIT Business School | Vellore Institute of Technology | 2019 - 2021
Teaching Fellow, Department of Management Studies, CEG | Anna University | 2010 - 2014
